im.duk.cml.api

Class Api

  • java.lang.Object
    • im.duk.cml.api.Api

  • public class Api
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for making requests to the CrystalMathLabs api. Requests are returned in the same format as in a web browser.
    Author:
    Andreas Holley

    • Constructor Detail

      • Api

        public Api()

    • Method Detail

      • updateReq

        public static java.lang.String updateReq(java.lang.String player)
        Make a an update request, which attempts to update the player on crystalmathlabs.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to make the request for.
        Returns:
        the return code from the api: 1 = Success! 2 = Player not on RuneScape hiscores. 3 = Negative XP gain detected. 4 = Unknown error. 5 = This player has been updated within the last 60 seconds. 6 = The player name was invalid.

      • lastCheckReq

        public static java.lang.String lastCheckReq(java.lang.String player)
        Make a lastcheck request, which gets the time(seconds) since the most recent data point.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to make the request for.
        Returns:
        the time since the last data point, in seconds.

      • lastChangeReq

        public static java.lang.String lastChangeReq(java.lang.String player)
        Make a lastchange request, which gets the time(seconds) since the most recent data point in which xp changed.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to make the request for.
        Returns:
        the time since the last data point, in seconds.

      • statsReq

        public static java.lang.String statsReq(java.lang.String player)
        Make a stats request, updates the player, gets the time of the most recent datapoint and the xp and rank for each skill.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to make the request for.
        Returns:
        the time since the most recent datapoint, followed by the xp and rank for each skill, in the format:
        (Time of most recent cml datapoint)
        (xp[0]),(rank[0])
        (xp[1]),(rank[1])
        ...
        (xp[23]),(rank[23])

      • ttmReq

        public static java.lang.String ttmReq(java.lang.String player)
        Get the approximate number of hours the given needs to play to get max total.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to make the request for.
        Returns:
        the time remaning, in hours.

      • ttmRankReq

        public static java.lang.String ttmRankReq(java.lang.String player)
        Get the 'Time to max rank' of the player, what rank they are in terms of closeness to maxing of all the players in the crystalmathlabs database.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to make the request for.
        Returns:
        the rank they are.

      • formatNameReq

        public static java.lang.String formatNameReq(java.lang.String player)
        Get the players name as it is stored in the database.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to make the request for.
        Returns:
        the players name as formatted in the database.

      • searchReq

        public static java.lang.String searchReq(java.lang.String player)
        Search the names of players in the database.
        Parameters:
        player - the part of name to search for.
        Returns:
        how many players found, followed by a comma separated list of player names containing the search string.

      • recordsOfPlayerReq

        public static java.lang.String recordsOfPlayerReq(java.lang.String player)
        Get the record experience gains of a given player.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to make the request for.
        Returns:
        the records, in the format:
        OverallDayRecord,OverallDayRecordTime,OverallWeekRecord, OverallWeekRecordTime,OverallMonthRecord,OverallMonthRecordTime

        AttackDayRecord,AttackDayRecordTime,AttackWeekRecord, AttackWeekRecordTime,AttackMonthRecord,AttackMonthRecordTime

        ...

      • trackReq

        public static java.lang.String trackReq(java.lang.String player,
                        int time)
        Updates the player and gets their latest track info.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to track.
        time - the time period (backwards, starting from the present) to get data from, in seconds. time=0 means all time.
        Returns:
        the xp change in the given time period, in the format:
        (Time of earliest cml datapoint)
        (xplatest[0]-xpearliest[0]),(ranklatest [0]-ranklatest[0]),(xpearliest[0])
        (xplatest[1]-xpearliest[1]),(ranklatest[1]-ranklatest[1]),( xpearliest[1])
        ...

      • dataPointsReq

        public static java.lang.String dataPointsReq(java.lang.String player,
                             int time)
        Get the datapoints for the given player.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to get the datapoints for.
        time - the time peroid (backwards, starting from the present) to get data from, in seconds. time=0 means all time.
        Returns:
        the datapoints within the given time, in the format:
        timeOfUpdate skillxp[0],skillxp[1],...skillrank[0],skillrank[1],...

      • playersReq

        public static java.lang.String playersReq()
        Get data on the number of players online on OSRS (generally <30 minutes old).
        Returns:
        the time (unix timestamp) at which the number was collected, and the number of players, in the format:
        unixTimeStamp,noOofPlayers

      • timeReq

        public static java.lang.String timeReq()
        Gets the current time on the crystalmathlabs server.
        Returns:
        the time(unix timestamp).

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
